text: Chronicle of the Years of Fire (; ; these names both mean "Chronicle of the Years of Embers") is a 1975 Algerian historical drama movie directed by Mohammed Lakhdar-Hamina (who also stars) and starring Yorgo Voyagis, Hadj Smaine Mohamed Seghir, Lelia Shenna, Fran√ßois Maistre. ==Other websites== * Category:1975 drama movies Category:1970s epic movies Category:1970s historical movies Category:Algerian movies Category:Movies directed by Mohammed Lakhdar-Hamina
title: Chronicle of the Years of Fire
